api_list.api_description: Creates a map with iDigBio data.

optional_parameters.name: rq
optional_parameters.description: Record Query in iDigBio Query Format.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve sunrise and sunset times for a specific location based on latitude and longitude.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the location in decimal degrees.

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the location in decimal degrees.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format or relative formats such as 'today'.

query: Can you generate a map showing locations of mammal species in the Amazon rainforest? Also, I want to know sunrise and sunset times in Manaus for a week from today.
